articles.title: Dingko Singh, Asian Games gold-winning boxer, dies after long battle with cancer - The Indian Express
articles.description: Dingko’s gold in the Bangkok Asiad was the first in 16 years for Indian boxing after Kaur Singh’s top finish at the regional showpiece’s 1982 edition.
articles.content: Former Asian Games gold medalist boxer Ngangom Dingko Singh passed away early Thursday morning at his Sekta Mayai Leikai residence, in Imphal East district, after battling a prolonged illness. He was… [+4322 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Austria's AT&S picks Malaysia for PCB, IC plant, total investment RM8.5b - The Star Online
articles.description: Austria-headquartered AT&S, which manufactures high-end printed circuit boards and substrates for semiconductors will set up a production plant in Malaysia, its first in Southeast Asia.
